table.name: Terminal
table.caption: Terminals
table.comment: List of terminals. Every entry is correspond one physical terminal.

column.name: SerialNumber
column.caption: Serial number
column.comment: Unique terminal number for identity in the system

column.name: IdleScreenSettings
column.caption: Idle Images collection
column.comment: Collection of images to display on terminal screen in IDLE.

column.name: ReceiptTemplateCollection
column.caption: Receipts templates
column.comment: Link to the table with collection of receipts templates

column.name: TerminalBusinessLogic
column.caption: Business logic
column.comment: Link to the Business Unit

column.name: AdditionalProcSettings
column.caption: Additional settings of transaction logic
column.comment: Settings of additional data requests during transactions

byte.label: Pre-Authorisation/Completion
byte.bit: Request receipt number of per-authorization for completion
Request RRN of per-authorization for completion
Request approval code of per-authorization for completion
Request date and time of per-authorization for completion
Use Transaction ID in pre-authorization/completion/cancellation chain

byte.label: Void/Refund
byte.bit: Request Transaction ID for refund transaction
Request approval code for refund transaction

column.name: isQRReadSupported
column.caption: QR data reading by terminal/softpos device is supported
column.comment: Flag should be set if on terminal or softpos device supported reading of QR data by devices hardware. (Not related to qr payments: Alipay or Faster Payments System)

column.name: autoSettlementReceipt
column.caption: Auto-settlement receipt printing
column.comment: Flag should be set if receipt for settlement initiated according schedule is necessary.

column.name: voidConfirmation
column.caption: Confirmation of cancellation data
column.comment: Flag should be set if for cancellation confirmation of transaction data is necessary

column.name: AmountSettings
column.caption: Amount entry settings (optional)
column.comment: *Please, contact ARIA.SOFT support for clarification about using of this setting

value.label: Entry of amount begins with integer part
Entry of amount in minimum units with floating point
Entry of amount in minimum units without floating point

column.name: BonusProfileTable
column.caption: Bonus profile
column.comment: PAN ranges list which support loyalty program 'Multibonus' or 'Bonus Plus'

column.name: QRKeysCollection
column.caption: Keys for QR data processing
column.comment: Collection of keys for QR data processing (Not related to qr payments: Alipay or Faster Payments System)

column.name: isUFI
column.caption: Support of User Friendly Interface
column.comment: Not for all clients

column.name: SW_AutoUpdate
column.caption: Auto-update POS software
column.comment: Automatic update for the latest version within maturity

column.name: Maturity
column.caption: Terminal's maturity
column.comment: Maturity level of operation

column.name: SW_Update
column.caption: Forcibly load specified software
column.comment: If set the specified software version will be loaded

column.name: SW_Manual
column.caption: POS software
column.comment: POS software version for the force update

column.name: SW_Update_Schedule
column.caption: Software update time
column.comment: Time range, when to upgrade terminal SW

column.name: TACDef
column.caption: TAC default
column.comment: Specifies the issuer's conditions that cause a transaction to be rejected if it might have been approved online, but the terminal is unable to process the transaction online.

byte.label: Byte 1
byte.bit: bit 8 - Offline data authentication was not performed
bit 5 - Card appears on terminal exception file

byte.label: Byte 2
byte.bit: bit 8 - ICC and terminal have different application versions
bit 6 - Application is not yet effective
bit 5 - Requested service not allowed for card product

byte.label: Byte 3
byte.bit: bit 8 - Cardholder verification was not successful
bit 5 - PIN entry required and PIN pad not present or not working
bit 4 - PIN entry required, PIN pad present, but PIN was not entered

byte.label: Byte 4
byte.bit: bit 7 - Lower consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 6 - Upper consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 5 - Transaction selected randomly for online processing

byte.label: Byte 5
byte.bit: bit 6 - Script processing failed before final GENERATE AC
bit 5 - Script processing failed after final GENERATE AC

column.name: TACDec
column.caption: TAC denial
column.comment: Specifies the issuer's conditions that cause the denial of a transaction without attempt to go online.

byte.label: Byte 1
byte.bit: bit 8 - Offline data authentication was not performed
bit 5 - Card appears on terminal exception file

byte.label: Byte 2
byte.bit: bit 8 - ICC and terminal have different application versions
bit 6 - Application is not yet effective
bit 5 - Requested service not allowed for card product

byte.label: Byte 3
byte.bit: bit 8 - Cardholder verification was not successful
bit 5 - PIN entry required and PIN pad not present or not working
bit 4 - PIN entry required, PIN pad present, but PIN was not entered

byte.label: Byte 4
byte.bit: bit 7 - Lower consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 6 - Upper consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 5 - Transaction selected randomly for online processing

byte.label: Byte 5
byte.bit: bit 6 - Script processing failed before final GENERATE AC
bit 5 - Script processing failed after final GENERATE AC

column.name: TACOnl
column.caption: TAC online
column.comment: Specifies the issuer's conditions that cause a transaction to be transmitted online.

byte.label: Byte 1
byte.bit: bit 8 - Offline data authentication was not performed
bit 5 - Card appears on terminal exception file

byte.label: Byte 2
byte.bit: bit 8 - ICC and terminal have different application versions
bit 6 - Application is not yet effective
bit 5 - Requested service not allowed for card product

byte.label: Byte 3
byte.bit: bit 8 - Cardholder verification was not successful
bit 5 - PIN entry required and PIN pad not present or not working
bit 4 - PIN entry required, PIN pad present, but PIN was not entered

byte.label: Byte 4
byte.bit: bit 7 - Lower consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 6 - Upper consecutive offline limit exceeded
bit 5 - Transaction selected randomly for online processing

byte.label: Byte 5
byte.bit: bit 6 - Script processing failed before final GENERATE AC
bit 5 - Script processing failed after final GENERATE AC

column.name: EMVTerminalType
column.caption: EMV terminal type
column.comment: Terminal type under EMV classification

value.label: 12 - Attended Financial Institution, offline with online capability
15 - Unattended Financial Institution, offline with online capability
22 - Attended Merchant, offline with online capability
25 - Unattended Merchant, offline with online capability

column.name: EmvTerminalCapabilities
column.caption: Terminal capabilities
column.comment: Indicates the card data input, CVM, and security capabilities of the Terminal. (TAG 9F33)

byte.label: Byte 2: CVM Capability
byte.bit: bit 8 - Plaintext PIN for ICC verification
bit 7 - Enciphered PIN for online verification
bit 5 - Enciphered PIN for offline verification

column.name: AddTerminalCap
column.caption: Additional Terminal Capabilities
column.comment: Indicates the data input and output capabilities of the Terminal (TAG 9F40)

byte.label: Byte 3
byte.bit: bit 7 - Alphabetic and special character keys

column.name: TermRiskMD
column.caption: Terminal Risk Management data
column.comment: Application-specific value used by the card for risk management purposes. Used for PayPass(Master Card contactless) cards (TAG 9F1D)

byte.label: Contact CVM
byte.bit: Enciphered PIN verification performed by ICC
Plaintext PIN verification performed by ICC

byte.label: Magstripe/EMV Contactless
byte.bit: Only EMV mode contactless transactions supported
Only mag-stripe mode contactless transactions supported

column.name: StopListExpTimeOut
column.caption: Stop list expiration time (in hours)
column.comment: If some of stop lists were not updated longer than number of hours in this field it will be considered as expired

column.name: isConfirmationForNotSupportedDCC
column.caption: Display attention message if conversion is not available and transaction will be processed in original currency

table.name: OrganizationBase
table.caption: Organization data
table.comment: Organizations list.

column.name: SupportedTransaction
column.caption: Supported transaction
column.comment: List of transaction that supported by Organization.

table.name: OrganizationPoint
table.caption: Organizations
table.comment: List of organizations that used this terminal.

column.name: MerchantCategoryCode
column.caption: Merchant category code
column.comment: Classifies the type of business being done by the merchant, represented according to ISO 8583:1993 for Card Acceptor Business Code(TAG 9F15).

column.name: ForbiddenCancellation
column.caption: Transaction with forbidden cancellation
column.comment: List of transactions for which cancellation should be forbidden.

column.name: fullReportForSTL
column.caption: Audit report before settlement
column.comment: Flag should be set if printing of audit report before settlement is necessary.

column.name: PasswordSettings
column.caption: Passwords settings
column.comment: Action under administrator password

column.name: SbpOnReadCardScreen
column.caption: Displaying of QR for payment on card reading screen

column.name: AccountName
column.caption: Account Name
column.comment: Optional data for special client functional

column.name: AccountNumber
column.caption: Account Number
column.comment: Optional data for special client functional

column.name: AccountToken
column.caption: Account Token
column.comment: Optional data for special client functional

table.name: HostSettings
table.caption: Host settings
table.comment: List of hosts for every organization. Settings are unique for each organization for one host.

column.name: HostConnection
column.caption: Name of host connection
column.comment: Name of host connection settings

column.name: TID
column.caption: Terminal ID
column.comment: The value send in request to financial host. Unique for each terminal on the one host.

column.name: MID
column.caption: Merchant ID
column.comment: The value send in request to financial host.

column.name: Settlement
column.caption: Settlement schedule
column.comment: Frequency and time of auto reconciliation.

column.name: ServiceSettings
column.caption: Service settings
column.comment: *Please, contact ARIAHOST support for clarification about using of this setting

value.label: Display balance on terminal display and print on receipt
Display balance on terminal display and print on receipt by request

column.name: AdditionalProcSettings
column.caption: Pre-Authorization/Authorization Completion/Refund
column.comment: Настройки запроса дополнительных данных во время проведения транзакций

byte.label: Pre-Authorisation/Completion
byte.bit: Request receipt number of per-authorization for completion
Request RRN of per-authorization for completion
Request approval code of per-authorization for completion
Request date and time of per-authorization for completion
Use Transaction ID in pre-authorization/completion/cancellation chain

byte.label: Void/Refund
byte.bit: Request Transaction ID for refund transaction
Request approval code for refund transaction

column.name: HostProtocol
column.caption: Connection protocol
column.comment: Name of financial host protocol.

table.name: ReceiptSettings
table.caption: Receipt printing settings
table.comment: Settings of transaction receipt printing

column.name: CountFirstReceipt
column.caption: Number of receipts
column.comment: Number of receipts to print(from 1 to 3)

column.name: FirstReceiptPrintConfirmation
column.caption: Confirmation of printing first transaction receipt
column.comment: If flag is set printing of first receipt should be confirmed in additional dialog.

column.name: SecondReceiptPrintConfirmation
column.caption: Confirmation of printing second transaction receipt
column.comment: If flag is set printing of second receipt should be confirmed in additional dialog. If it is not, second receipt will be printed unconditionally after info message.

column.name: CountSecondReceipt
column.caption: Number of receipts
column.comment: Number of receipts to print(from 1 to 3)

column.name: ReconcileReceiptPrintConfirmation
column.caption: Confirmation of printing reconciliation receipt
column.comment: If flag is set printing of reconciliation receipt should be confirmed in additional dialog.

table.name: PrintCardDataSettings
table.caption: Printing of card data
table.comment: Settings of printing data from card on receipt

column.name: LeftNotMasked
column.caption: Not Masked form left
column.comment: Number of PAN symbols that will be not masked from the left. (not grater then 6)

column.name: RightNotMasked
column.caption: Not Masked form right
column.comment: Number of PAN symbols that will be not masked from the right. (not grater then 4)

column.name: PrintExpDate
column.caption: Print card expiration date
column.comment: If flag is set exp. date of card will be printed on transaction receipt.

column.name: PrintCardholder
column.caption: Print cardholder name
column.comment: If flag is set cardholder name will be printed on transaction receipt.

table.name: CardProduct
table.caption: Card products
table.comment: List of card ranges group combined by same properties

column.name: PinReqTran
column.caption: PIN required transaction (magnetic stripe)
column.comment: Transaction PIN Settings

column.name: PinReqTranManual
column.caption: PIN required transaction (manual entry)
column.comment: Transaction PIN Settings

column.name: PinReqTranQr
column.caption: PIN required transaction (QR)
column.comment: Transaction PIN Settings

column.name: isOTPReqForQR
column.caption: Request OTP, if card data was received form QR

column.name: isOTPReqForManual
column.caption: Request OTP, if card data was entered manually

table.name: BINRange
table.caption: PAN ranges
table.comment: Directory with PAN ranges.

table.name: EMVApplication
table.caption: EMV applications
table.comment: Directory of tables with description of contact/contactless EMV application

column.name: AppLabel
column.caption: Application label
column.comment: Application Label

column.name: AID
column.caption: Application identifier(AID)
column.comment: Identifies the application as described in ISO/IEC 7816-5. (TAG 9F06)

column.name: APPVer
column.caption: Application version number
column.comment: Version number assigned by the payment system for the Kernel application. (TAG 9F06)

column.name: TACTab
column.caption: Terminal Action Codes
column.comment: Link to table Terminal Action Codes

column.name: TDOL
column.caption: Default TDOL
column.comment: Default Transaction Certificate Data Object List. TDOL to be used for generating the TC Hash Value if the TDOL in the card is not present.

column.name: DDOL
column.caption: Default DDOL
column.comment: Default Dynamic Data Authentication Data Object List. DDOL to be used for constructing the INTERNAL AUTHENTICATE command if the DDOL in the card is not present.

column.name: exactMatch
column.caption: AID exact only selection
column.comment: Indicates whether the associated AID in the terminal must match the AID in the card exactly, including the length of the AID, or only up to the length of the AID in the terminal.

column.name: TermRiskMD
column.caption: Terminal Risk Management data
column.comment: Application-specific value used by the card for risk management purposes. Used for Master Card cards (TAG 9F1D)

byte.label: Contact CVM
byte.bit: Enciphered PIN verification performed by ICC
Plaintext PIN verification performed by ICC

byte.label: Magstripe/EMV Contactless
byte.bit: Only EMV mode contactless transactions supported
Only mag-stripe mode contactless transactions supported

column.name: AdditionalAppProcOptions
column.caption: Additional application processing options
column.comment: b8 - EMV kernel has to support PIN bypass mechanic (for ICC contact operations) b6, b7 - EMV kernel code implementing CVM check, risk management and restrictions analysis inherent to full EMV processing will be bypassed for operation specified

byte.label: Additional options
byte.bit: b8 - Permit transactions if client deny enter PIN
b7 - Disable CVM check for Balance
b6 - Disable CVM check for Refund

column.name: AppExpDateThreshold
column.caption: Application expiration threshold (YYMMDD)
column.comment: Example: Threshold date February 1, 2022 should be written like this - "220201"

column.name: Threshold
column.caption: Threshold
column.comment: Any transaction with a transaction amount less than the Threshold will be subject to selection at random without further regard for the value of the transaction.

column.name: MaxTrgPercent
column.caption: MAX Target Percentage
column.comment: Maximum Target Percentage to be Used for Biased Random Selection.

column.name: TrgPercent
column.caption: Target Percentage
column.comment: Target Percentage to be Used for Random Selection.

column.name: useCTLS
column.caption: Use As Contactless
column.comment: If flag is set, application will be used as contactless too.

column.name: CTLSTACTab
column.caption: Contactless Terminal Action Codes
column.comment: Link to table Terminal Action Codes

column.name: TTQ
column.caption: TTQ
column.comment: Terminal Transaction Qualifiers. Indicates reader capabilities, requirements, and preferences to the card. Supported for VISA and Union PAY application. (TAG 9F66)

column.name: TermRiskMDVisa
column.caption: Terminal Risk Management data
column.comment: Application-specific value used by the card for risk management purposes. Used for PayWave (VISA contactless) cards (TAG 9F1D)

byte.label: Tag 9F1D data
byte.bit: b8: Status Check (VCPS,v2.2,Req 5.31). 0-check is disabled, 1-check is enabled
b7: (in pair with b6) ...01(b7 is not set b6 is set)-check set to Option 1, 10(b7 is set bit 6 is not set)-check set to Option 2, 11(both bits are set)-RFU
b6: (in pair with b7) Amount, Authorized of Zero Check (VCPS,v2.2,Req 5.32). 00(both bits are not set)-check is disabled,...
b5: Reader Contactless Transaction Limit (RCTL) Check (VCPS,v2.2,Req 5.34). 0-check is disabled, 1-check is enabled
b4: Reader CVM Required Limit Check (VCPS,v2.2,Req 5.35). 0-check is disabled, 1-check is enabled
b3: Reader Contactless Floor Limit Check (VCPS,v2.2,Req 5.36). 0-check is disabled, 1-check is enabled

column.name: TTPMCap
column.caption: Terminal TPM Capabilities
column.comment: For MIR application (TAG DF55).

column.name: DataExcTagList
column.caption: Data Exchange Tag List
column.comment: List of tags for Data Exchange functionality. (for MIR application) Tag FF04.

column.name: TranRecoveryLimit
column.caption: Transaction Recovery Limit
column.comment: Limit of the number of attempts to restore a transaction with errors in data exchange with the card. (TagDF56)

column.name: CTLSReaderCap
column.caption: Contactless Reader Capabilities
column.comment: Used for ExpressPay(AMEX contactless) cards (TAG 9F6D)

column.name: ECTLSReaderCap
column.caption: Enhanced Contactless Reader Capabilities
column.comment: Used for ExpressPay(AMEX contactless) cards (TAG 9F6E).

byte.label: Byte 1
byte.bit: ExpressPay EMV partial online mode supported
Try Another Interface after a decline

byte.label: Byte 4
byte.bit: Terminal Exempt from No CVM Checks
ExpressPay Kernel Version (set for 3.1 and 4.0.x / not set for 3.0)
ExpressPay Kernel Version (set for 3.0 and 4.0.x / not set for 3.1)

column.name: CTLSKernelConfigMasterCard
column.caption: Contactless Kernel Configuration
column.comment: Used for Master Card cards (TAG DF811B)

byte.label: Contactless CVM
byte.bit: 8 - Mag-stripe mode contactless transactions not supported
7 - EMV mode contactless transactions not supported
3 - Read all records even when no CDA

column.name: TransactionBlockLevel
column.caption: Battery level, when processing of transactions should be forbidden (%)

column.comment: Text of link to the instruction page

column.name: DLSBin
column.caption: BIN
column.comment: BIN (F2)

value.label: Tag is mandatory (9F6E without last 3 byte)
Tag and application is optional (use 2nd generation tags)
Tag is mandatory (use 2nd generation card ids)
Co-brand application is mandatory(use 2nd generation card ids)

column.name: DLSTag
column.caption: DLS Tag
column.comment: Tag 9F6E (F4)

column.name: DLSLabel
column.caption: DLS co-brand label
column.comment: F5

table.name: System_POS_SW
table.caption: Terminal SW
table.comment: Dictionary of available SW

column.name: Version
column.caption: Version
column.comment: SW Version

column.name: FloorLimit
column.caption: Offline limit
column.comment: Indicates the transaction amount above which transactions must be authorized online. Processing could be different for different payment systems.

column.name: CVMLimit
column.caption: CVM Limit
column.comment: Transaction with amount above this limit should be processed with cardholder verification (in minimum payment unit).

column.name: CTLSFloorLimit
column.caption: Offline limit
column.comment: Indicates the transaction amount above which transactions must be authorized online. Processing could be different for different payment systems.

column.name: ReaderCVMLimit
column.caption: CVM Limit
column.comment: Indicates the transaction amount above which the Kernel instantiates the CVM capabilities field in Terminal Capabilities with CVM Capability - CVM Required. Processing could be different for different payment systems.

column.name: CurNonCDCVMLimit
column.caption: Terminal Contactless Limit (Non CD-CVM)
column.comment: Contactless operation limit without CD-CVM (Consumer Device Cardholder Verification)

column.name: CurCDCVMLimit
column.caption: Terminal Contactless Limit (CD-CVM)
column.comment: Contactless operation limit with CD-CVM (Consumer Device Cardholder Verification)

value.label: Operations report (Х – report), full, sorted by issuer
Operations report (Х – report), full, sorted by date

table.name: BonusPlusRange
table.caption: Bonus plus ranges
table.comment: Dictionary with ranges of PAN for Bonus Plus functionality

table.name: QRKeysCollection
table.caption: QR keys
table.comment: Collection of keys for QR data processing (Not related to qr payments: Alipay or Faster Payments System)
